trans-unit.source: So resolve upon your plan and then come [forward] in line. And he has succeeded today who overcomes."
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले आफ्नो योजना मा समाधान र त्यसपछि [अगाडि] आउन लाइन मा।

trans-unit.source: They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw."
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले "हे मोशा, या त तपाईं फेंक वा हामी फेंक पहिलो हुनेछ।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: He said, "Rather, you throw." And suddenly their ropes and staffs seemed to him from their magic that they were moving [like snakes].
trans-unit.target: उहाँले "बरु, तपाईं फेंक।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: And he sensed within himself apprehension, did Moses.
trans-unit.target: र उहाँले मोशालाई गरे आफूलाई भित्र आशंका sensed।

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "Fear not. Indeed, it is you who are superior.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह डर छैन। वास्तवमा, यो तपाईं उच्च भएका छ ", भन्नुभयो।

trans-unit.source: And throw what is in your right hand; it will swallow up what they have crafted. What they have crafted is but the trick of a magician, and the magician will not succeed wherever he is."
trans-unit.target: र आफ्नो दाहिने हात मा छ के फेंक;

trans-unit.source: So the magicians fell down in prostration. They said, "We have believed in the Lord of Aaron and Moses."
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले जादुगर prostration मा लड्यो।

trans-unit.source: [Pharaoh] said, "You believed him before I gave you permission. Indeed, he is your leader who has taught you magic. So I will surely cut off your hands and your feet on opposite sides, and I will crucify you on the trunks of palm trees, and you will surely know which of us is more severe in [giving] punishment and more enduring."
trans-unit.target: [फिरऊनलाई] वास्तवमा, उहाँले त्यसैले म पक्कै विपरीत पक्षले आफ्नो हात र आफ्नो खुट्टा काटेर तपाईंलाई जादू सिकाउनुभएको छ जो आफ्नो नेता छ।, र म चड्डी मा तपाईं क्रुसमा टाँग्नुहोस् हुनेछ। म तपाईंलाई अनुमति दिनुभयो अघि तपाईंले उहाँलाई विश्वास ", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: They said, "Never will we prefer you over what has come to us of clear proofs and [over] He who created us. So decree whatever you are to decree. You can only decree for this worldly life.
trans-unit.target: तपाईं यस सांसारिक जीवनको लागि मात्र उर्दी सक्छन् हामीले कहिल्यै स्पष्ट प्रमाणहरू हामीलाई गर्न आएको छ के भन्दा तपाईं रुचि र [भन्दा] उहाँले हामीलाई जो सिर्जना गरियो। त्यसैले उर्दी जो पनि तिमी उर्दी हो ", भन्नुभयो।।

trans-unit.source: Indeed, we have believed in our Lord that He may forgive us our sins and what you compelled us [to do] of magic. And Allah is better and more enduring."
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा हामीले उहाँले हामीलाई जादू को [गर्न] हाम्रो पाप र के तपाईं हामीलाई compelled क्षमा गर्न सक्छ भन्ने हाम्रो प्रभु विश्वास छ।

trans-unit.source: Indeed, whoever comes to his Lord as a criminal - indeed, for him is Hell; he will neither die therein nor live.
trans-unit.target: ;, उहाँलाई नरक छ लागि साँच्चै - साँच्चै, जसले आफ्नो प्रभु गर्न एक आपराधिक रूपमा आउँछ

trans-unit.source: But whoever comes to Him as a believer having done righteous deeds - for those will be the highest degrees [in position]:
trans-unit.target: तर जसले उहाँलाई आउँछ विश्वास धार्मिक कामहरू गरेका भएको - लागि ती उच्चतम डिग्री [स्थितिमा] हुनेछ:

trans-unit.source: Gardens of perpetual residence beneath which rivers flow, wherein they abide eternally. And that is the reward of one who purifies himself.
trans-unit.target: सदैव निवास उद्यान जो मुनि wherein तिनीहरूले अनन्तको पालन नदी प्रवाह।

trans-unit.source: And We had inspired to Moses, "Travel by night with My servants and strike for them a dry path through the sea; you will not fear being overtaken [by Pharaoh] nor be afraid [of drowning]."
trans-unit.target: र हामी मोशाले प्रेरणा थियो "मेरो सेवक र समुद्र मार्फत सुक्खा बाटो तिनीहरूलाई लागि हडताल संग रात यात्रा; तपाईं overtaken भइरहेको [फिरऊनलाई द्वारा] न त [डूब को] डराउनु डर छैन।"

trans-unit.source: So Pharaoh pursued them with his soldiers, and there covered them from the sea that which covered them,
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले फिरऊनले आफ्ना सैनिकहरूलाई तिनीहरूलाई अपनाए, र त्यहाँ तिनीहरूलाई ढाकिएको जो कि समुद्र तिनीहरूलाई ढाकिएको,

trans-unit.source: And Pharaoh led his people astray and did not guide [them].
trans-unit.target: र फिरऊनलाई हराउनु आफ्नो मान्छे नेतृत्व र मार्गदर्शन गर्नुभयो [तिनीहरूलाई]।

trans-unit.source: O Children of Israel, We delivered you from your enemy, and We made an appointment with you at the right side of the mount, and We sent down to you manna and quails,
trans-unit.target: इस्राएलका हे बच्चाहरु, हामी तपाईँलाई तपाईँको शत्रु छुटकारा, र हामी माउन्ट को दाहिनेपट्टि तपाईं संग एक नियुक्ति गरे, र हामी तपाईंलाई मन्न र quails तल पठाइएको,

trans-unit.source: [Saying], "Eat from the good things with which We have provided you and do not transgress [or oppress others] therein, lest My anger should descend upon you. And he upon whom My anger descends has certainly fallen."
trans-unit.target: [भनाइ], "जो संग तपाईँले प्रदान गरेको छ र transgress छैन [वा अरूलाई दमन] मेरो क्रोध तिमीहरूमा धमकना गर्नुपर्छ नत्र, यसमा राम्रो कुरा खाने। अनि जसलाई मा उहाँले मेरो क्रोध पक्कै पनि खसेको छ उतरती।"

trans-unit.source: But indeed, I am the Perpetual Forgiver of whoever repents and believes and does righteousness and then continues in guidance.
trans-unit.target: तर साँच्चै, म जसले repents र विश्वास गर्छ र धार्मिकता गर्छ को सदैव Forgiver छु र त्यसपछि निर्देशन मा जारी छ।

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "And what made you hasten from your people, O Moses?"
trans-unit.target: [अल्लाह] "तपाईं आफ्नो मान्छे, हे मोशा देखि hasten गरे के? अनि" भने,

trans-unit.source: He said, "They are close upon my tracks, and I hastened to You, my Lord, that You be pleased."
trans-unit.target: उहाँले "तिनीहरू मेरो ट्रयाक मा नजिक छन्। र म तपाईं खुसी हुन कि, तपाईं, मेरो प्रभु गर्न hastened", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "But indeed, We have tried your people after you [departed], and the Samiri has led them astray."
trans-unit.target: [अल्लाह] भन्नुभयो, "तर साँच्चै, हामी तपाईंलाई [प्रस्थान] पछि आफ्नो मान्छे प्रयास गरेका छन्, र Samiri हराउनु तिनीहरूलाई नेतृत्व गरेको छ।"

trans-unit.source: So Moses returned to his people, angry and grieved. He said, "O my people, did your Lord not make you a good promise? Then, was the time [of its fulfillment] too long for you, or did you wish that wrath from your Lord descend upon you, so you broke your promise [of obedience] to me?"
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले मोशा, आफ्नो मान्छे फर्के रिस र दुःखित।

trans-unit.source: They said, "We did not break our promise to you by our will, but we were made to carry burdens from the ornaments of the people [of Pharaoh], so we threw them [into the fire], and thus did the Samiri throw."
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरू हामी हाम्रो इच्छा तपाईंलाई हाम्रो प्रतिज्ञा भङ्ग गरेनन् ", भन्नुभयो, तर हामीले [फिरऊनकी] मान्छे को गहने देखि बोझ बोक्न गरिएका थिए, त्यसैले हामी तिनीहरूलाई फाले [आगोमा], र यसरी Samiri फेंक गरे

trans-unit.source: And he extracted for them [the statue of] a calf which had a lowing sound, and they said, "This is your god and the god of Moses, but he forgot."
trans-unit.target: अनि उहाँले एक बाछो एक lowing ध्वनि थियो जो [को मुर्ति] तिनीहरूलाई लागि झिकिएको, र तिनीहरूले भने, "यो तपाईंको परमेश्वर र मोशाको भगवान छ, तर उहाँले बिर्सनुभयो।"

trans-unit.source: Did they not see that it could not return to them any speech and that it did not possess for them any harm or benefit?
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले तिनीहरूलाई कुनै पनि भाषण फर्कन छैन भनेर र सक्ने तिनीहरूलाई लागि कुनै पनि हानि अधिकार छैन वा लाभ उठाउन हेर्न भएन?

trans-unit.source: And Aaron had already told them before [the return of Moses], "O my people, you are only being tested by it, and indeed, your Lord is the Most Merciful, so follow me and obey my order."
trans-unit.target: र हारून पहिले नै, अघि [मोशाको फिर्ती] तिनीहरूलाई भनेका थिए "हे मेरा मानिसहरू, तपाईं मात्र यो द्वारा परीक्षण गर्दै छन् भइरहेको र साँच्चै, आफ्नो प्रभु सबैभन्दा दयालु छ, त्यसैले मलाई पछ्याउन र मेरो अर्डर पालन गर्छन्।"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We will never cease being devoted to the calf until Moses returns to us."
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले "हामी मोशा हामीलाई फिर्ता नभएसम्म बाछो समर्पित भइरहेको बन्द कहिल्यै हुनेछ।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "O Aaron, what prevented you, when you saw them going astray,
trans-unit.target: [मोशाले] जब तपाईं तिनीहरूलाई हराउनु जाँदै देखे, तपाईं रोकियो के, हे हारूनको ", भन्नुभयो,

trans-unit.source: From following me? Then have you disobeyed my order?"
trans-unit.target: मलाई पछ्याउन?

trans-unit.source: [Aaron] said, "O son of my mother, do not seize [me] by my beard or by my head. Indeed, I feared that you would say, 'You caused division among the Children of Israel, and you did not observe [or await] my word.' "
trans-unit.target: [हारून] मेरी आमाको हे छोरा, मेरो दारी वा मेरो टाउको द्वारा जफत छैन [मलाई] "भन्नुभयो। वास्तवमा, म के तपाईं इस्राएलका बच्चाहरु बीचमा विभाजन कारण ', थियो भन्न, र तपाईं पालन गरेनन् भनेर मानिसहरू डराउँदैनन्

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "And what is your case, O Samiri?"
trans-unit.target: "? अनि आफ्नो मामला, हे Samiri के छ" [मोशाले] भन्नुभयो,

trans-unit.source: He said, "I saw what they did not see, so I took a handful [of dust] from the track of the messenger and threw it, and thus did my soul entice me."
trans-unit.target: उहाँले "म के तिनीहरूले देख्न गर्नुभयो देखे, त्यसैले म मेरो प्राण मलाई लोभ्याउन थिएन दूत को ट्रयाकबाट [धूलो को] एक मुट्ठी लिएर र यो फाले, र यसरी।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: [Moses] said, "Then go. And indeed, it is [decreed] for you in [this] life to say, 'No contact.' And indeed, you have an appointment [in the Hereafter] you will not fail to keep. And look at your 'god' to which you remained devoted. We will surely burn it and blow it into the sea with a blast.
trans-unit.target: [मोशाले] भन्नुभयो, "त्यसपछि जानुहोस्। अनि साँच्चै, यो [आदेश] तपाईं को लागि मा [यो] जीवन, भन्न छ 'कुनै सम्पर्क।'

trans-unit.source: Your god is only Allah, except for whom there is no deity. He has encompassed all things in knowledge."
trans-unit.target: तपाईंको परमेश्वरले मात्र अल्लाह, त्यहाँ कुनै उहााको ईश्वरत्व छ जसको लागि बाहेक छ।

trans-unit.source: Thus, [O Muhammad], We relate to you from the news of what has preceded. And We have certainly given you from Us the Qur'an.
trans-unit.target: तसर्थ, [हे मुहम्मद], हामी तपाईं preceded छ के को समाचार बाट सम्बन्धित।

trans-unit.source: Whoever turns away from it - then indeed, he will bear on the Day of Resurrection a burden,
trans-unit.target: जसले यो टाढा उत्तेजित गर्दछ - त्यसपछि साँच्चै, उहाँले पुनरुत्थान एक बोझको दिन मा सहन हुनेछ,

trans-unit.source: [Abiding] eternally therein, and evil it is for them on the Day of Resurrection as a load -
trans-unit.target: [पालन] सधैंको यसमा, र दुष्ट तिनीहरूलाई लागि एक लोड रूपमा पुनरुत्थान को दिन मा छ -

trans-unit.source: The Day the Horn will be blown. And We will gather the criminals, that Day, blue-eyed.
trans-unit.target: दिन हर्नले उडा गरिनेछ।

trans-unit.source: They will murmur among themselves, "You remained not but ten [days in the world]."
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरू आपसमा गनगन हुनेछ "तपाईं रहेका तर दस [संसारमा दिन]।"

trans-unit.source: We are most knowing of what they say when the best of them in manner will say, "You remained not but one day."
trans-unit.target: हामी तिनीहरूले तरिकामा तिनीहरूलाई को सबै भन्दा राम्रो, हुनेछ भन्न जब भन्न के को सबै भन्दा जानने छन् "तपाईं तर एक दिन छैन रह्यो।"

trans-unit.source: And they ask you about the mountains, so say, "My Lord will blow them away with a blast.
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले पहाड बारेमा सोध्न, त्यसैले, "भन्न मेरो प्रभु एक विस्फोट तिनीहरूलाई टाढा झटका हुनेछ।

trans-unit.source: And He will leave the earth a level plain;
trans-unit.target: अनि उहाँले पृथ्वीलाई स्तर सादा छोड्न हुनेछ;

trans-unit.source: You will not see therein a depression or an elevation."
trans-unit.target: तपाईं एक निराशा वा उचाइमा यसमा हेर्न छैन। "

trans-unit.source: That Day, everyone will follow [the call of] the Caller [with] no deviation therefrom, and [all] voices will be stilled before the Most Merciful, so you will not hear except a whisper [of footsteps].
trans-unit.target: त्यो दिन, सबैलाई आउने [को कल] कलर [संग] therefrom कुनै विचलन, र त तपाईं [पाइला को] एक लेकानेखुसीगर्छ बाहेक सुन्नुहुने छैन [सबै] आवाज, सबैभन्दा दयालु अघि सुन्न गरिनेछ।

trans-unit.source: That Day, no intercession will benefit except [that of] one to whom the Most Merciful has given permission and has accepted his word.
trans-unit.target: त्यो दिन, कुनै अन्तर्विन्ती बाहेक लाभ हुनेछ एक सबैभन्दा दयालु अनुमति दिइएको छ र उहाँको वचन स्वीकार गर्नुभएको छ जसलाई [को भनेर]।

trans-unit.source: Allah knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, but they do not encompass it in knowledge.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह [वर्तमान] तिनीहरूलाई अघि के थाह छ र तिनीहरूलाई पछि के हुनेछ, तर तिनीहरूले ज्ञान यो encompass छैन।

trans-unit.source: And [all] faces will be humbled before the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of existence. And he will have failed who carries injustice.
trans-unit.target: र [सबै] अनुहारहरू कभी-बैठक अघि, अस्तित्वको Sustainer नम्र तुल्याए गरिनेछ।

trans-unit.source: But he who does of righteous deeds while he is a believer - he will neither fear injustice nor deprivation.
trans-unit.target: तर उहाँले जो धार्मिक कामहरू को गर्छ त्यो विश्वास छ, जबकि - उहाँले न अन्याय न त deprivation डर हुनेछ।

trans-unit.source: And thus We have sent it down as an Arabic Qur'an and have diversified therein the warnings that perhaps they will avoid [sin] or it would cause them remembrance.
trans-unit.target: र यसरी हामी यो एक अरबी कुरान रूपमा तल पठाएको छ र यसमा सायद तिनीहरूले [पाप] जोगिन हुनेछ या उनलाई सम्झनामा कारण हुनेछ चेतावनी विविध छन्।

trans-unit.source: So high [above all] is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth. And, [O Muhammad], do not hasten with [recitation of] the Qur'an before its revelation is completed to you, and say, "My Lord, increase me in knowledge."
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले [सबै माथि] उच्च अल्लाह, सार्वभौम, सत्य हो।

trans-unit.source: And We had already taken a promise from Adam before, but he forgot; and We found not in him determination.
trans-unit.target: र हामी पहिले नै आदमबाट प्रतिज्ञा अघि लिएका थिए, तर उहाँले बिर्सनुभयो;

trans-unit.source: And [mention] when We said to the angels, "Prostrate to Adam," and they prostrated, except Iblees; he refused.
trans-unit.target: र [उल्लेख] हामी स्वर्गदूतहरू यसो भन्नुभयो, "आदमलाई लमतन्न परेर पसारिएका," र तिनीहरू Iblees बाहेक, prostrated;

trans-unit.source: So We said, "O Adam, indeed this is an enemy to you and to your wife. Then let him not remove you from Paradise so you would suffer.
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले हामी हे आदम, साँच्चै यो तपाईं र तपाईंको पत्नी गर्न शत्रु हो ", भन्नुभयो। त्यसपछि उहाँलाई तपाईं ग्रस्त थियो त्यसैले प्रमोदवनमा तपाईं हटाउन गरौं।

trans-unit.source: Indeed, it is [promised] for you not to be hungry therein or be unclothed.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा, यो तपाईं यसमा भोक हुन वा unclothed हुन लागि [प्रतिज्ञा] छ।

trans-unit.source: And indeed, you will not be thirsty therein or be hot from the sun."
trans-unit.target: अनि साँच्चै, तपाईं तिर्खाएको यसमा छैन वा सूर्य ले तातो हुन। "

trans-unit.source: Then Satan whispered to him; he said, "O Adam, shall I direct you to the tree of eternity and possession that will not deteriorate?"
trans-unit.target: त्यसपछि शैतानले उहाँलाई whispered;

trans-unit.source: And Adam and his wife ate of it, and their private parts became apparent to them, and they began to fasten over themselves from the leaves of Paradise. And Adam disobeyed his Lord and erred.
trans-unit.target: र आदम र तिनकी पत्नी यो खाए, र आफ्नो निजी भागहरु तिनीहरूलाई स्पष्ट भयो, र तिनीहरूले प्रमोदवनमा को पात बाट आफूलाई कस्नु गर्न थाले।

trans-unit.source: Then his Lord chose him and turned to him in forgiveness and guided [him].
trans-unit.target: त्यसपछि आफ्नो प्रभु उहाँलाई रोजे र क्षमा उहाँलाई फर्केर निर्देशित [उहाँलाई]।

trans-unit.source: [Allah] said, "Descend from Paradise - all, [your descendants] being enemies to one another. And if there should come to you guidance from Me - then whoever follows My guidance will neither go astray [in the world] nor suffer [in the Hereafter].
trans-unit.target: [अल्लाह] ", भन्नुभयो प्रमोदवनमा देखि धमकना -। सबै, [आफ्नो सन्तानलाई] आपसमा शत्रु हुनुको अनि यदि तपाईं गर्न निर्देशन मलाई देखि आउनु पर्छ - त्यसपछि जसले निम्नानुसार मेरो निर्देशन न [संसारमा] हराउनु जाने न त दुःख [हुनेछ

trans-unit.source: And whoever turns away from My remembrance - indeed, he will have a depressed life, and We will gather him on the Day of Resurrection blind."
trans-unit.target: र जसले मेरो सम्झनामा टाढा उत्तेजित गर्दछ - साँच्चै, उहाँले एक निराश जीवन छ, र हामी पुनरुत्थानको अन्धो को दिन मा उहाँलाई भेला हुनेछ "।

trans-unit.source: He will say, "My Lord, why have you raised me blind while I was [once] seeing?"
trans-unit.target: उहाँले, भन्न हुनेछ "मेरो प्रभु, म किन [पटक] देखेर हुँदा तिमी मलाई अन्धा खडा छ?"

trans-unit.source: [Allah] will say, "Thus did Our signs come to you, and you forgot them; and thus will you this Day be forgotten."
trans-unit.target: [अल्लाह], भन्न हुनेछ "यसरी हाम्रो संकेत तपाईं आउनुभएको थिएन, र तपाईं तिनीहरूलाई भूल;। र यसरी तपाईं यस दिन भूल हुनेछ"

trans-unit.source: And thus do We recompense he who transgressed and did not believe in the signs of his Lord. And the punishment of the Hereafter is more severe and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: र यसरी हामी transgressed र आफ्नो प्रभुको संकेत मा विश्वास गरेनन् जसले recompense गर्छन्।

trans-unit.source: Then, has it not become clear to them how many generations We destroyed before them as they walk among their dwellings? Indeed in that are signs for those of intelligence.
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले dwellings बीचमा हिंड्दा हामी तिनीहरूलाई अघि नाश कति पुस्तामा त्यसपछि, यो तिनीहरूलाई स्पष्ट भएको छ छैन?

trans-unit.source: And if not for a word that preceded from your Lord, punishment would have been an obligation [due immediately], and [if not for] a specified term [decreed].
trans-unit.target: र आफ्नो प्रभु देखि preceded एक शब्द को लागि भने सजाय एउटा दायित्व [कारण तुरुन्तै] भएको थियो, र निर्दिष्ट अवधि [आदेश] [लागि भने छैन]।

trans-unit.source: So be patient over what they say and exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord before the rising of the sun and before its setting; and during periods of the night [exalt Him] and at the ends of the day, that you may be satisfied.
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले तिनीहरूले के भन्न भन्दा रोगी हुन र उच्च पार्ने [अल्लाह] सूर्य को बढ्दो र अघि आफ्नो प्रभु प्रशंसा यसको सेटिङ अघि;

trans-unit.source: And do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [some] categories of them, [its being but] the splendor of worldly life by which We test them. And the provision of your Lord is better and more enduring.
trans-unit.target: र जो हामी गर्न, [केही] तिनीहरूलाई को विभाग [यसको अस्तित्व तर] हामी तिनीहरूलाई परीक्षण जो सांसारिक जीवन शोभा आनन्दको दिएको छ कि तिर आफ्नो आँखा विस्तार छैन।

trans-unit.source: And enjoin prayer upon your family [and people] and be steadfast therein. We ask you not for provision; We provide for you, and the [best] outcome is for [those of] righteousness.
trans-unit.target: र आफ्नो परिवार [र मान्छे] मा प्रार्थना हुक्म चलान र यसमा स्थिर हुन।

trans-unit.source: And they say, "Why does he not bring us a sign from his Lord?" Has there not come to them evidence of what was in the former scriptures?
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले "किन उहाँले आफ्नो प्रभु हामीलाई एक चिन्ह ल्याउन छैन?" भन्न

trans-unit.source: And if We had destroyed them with a punishment before him, they would have said, "Our Lord, why did You not send to us a messenger so we could have followed Your verses before we were humiliated and disgraced?"
trans-unit.target: र हामी उहाँलाई अघि दण्ड तिनीहरूलाई नाश थियो भने, उनीहरूले थियो गरेको छ, "हाम्रा प्रभु, तपाईं किन हामीलाई दूत त हामी तपाईंको पद पछि सक्थे गर्न हामी अपमान र लज्जित थिए अघि पठाउन भएन?" भने

trans-unit.source: Say, "Each [of us] is waiting; so wait. For you will know who are the companions of the sound path and who is guided."
trans-unit.target: भन्छन्, "[हामी] प्रत्येक प्रतीक्षामा छ; त्यसैले प्रतीक्षा तपाईंलाई थाहा हुनेछ लागि ध्वनि बाटो को को हुन् र कसले निर्देशित छ।।"

trans-unit.source: [The time of] their account has approached for the people, while they are in heedlessness turning away.
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले टाढा खोल्दै heedlessness मा हुँदा आफ्नो खाता [को समय] मानिसहरूको लागि, नजिक छ।

trans-unit.source: No mention comes to them anew from their Lord except that they listen to it while they are at play
trans-unit.target: कुनै उल्लेख तिनीहरूलाई तिनीहरूले प्ले मा हुँदा तिनीहरूले सुन्न भनेर बाहेक आफ्नो प्रभु देखि फेरि नयाँ आउँछ

trans-unit.source: With their hearts distracted. And those who do wrong conceal their private conversation, [saying], "Is this [Prophet] except a human being like you? So would you approach magic while you are aware [of it]?"
trans-unit.target: आफ्नो हृदयले विचलित।

trans-unit.source: The Prophet said, "My Lord knows whatever is said throughout the heaven and earth, and He is the Hearing, the Knowing."
trans-unit.target: अगमवक्ता "मेरो प्रभु जस्तोसुकै स्वर्ग र पृथ्वी भर भने थाह छ, र उहाँले श्रवण, त्यो जानने छ।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: But they say, "[The revelation is but] a mixture of false dreams; rather, he has invented it; rather, he is a poet. So let him bring us a sign just as the previous [messengers] were sent [with miracles]."
trans-unit.target: बरु, उहाँले एक कवि छ त्यसैले उसलाई हामीलाई अघिल्लो [दूतहरूलाई] चमत्कार संग पठाइयो जस्तै [एक चिन्ह ल्याउन गरौं; तर तिनीहरूले "[गर्नुभएको प्रकाश तर छ] झूटा सपना को एक मिश्रण भन्न; बरु, उहाँले यो आविष्कार भएको छ।

trans-unit.source: Not a [single] city which We destroyed believed before them, so will they believe?
trans-unit.target: एक [एकल] शहर हामी तिनीहरूलाई अघि विश्वास नष्ट जो, त्यसैले तिनीहरूले विश्वास छैन?

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you, [O Muhammad], except men to whom We revealed [the message], so ask the people of the message if you do not know.
trans-unit.target: र हामी [सन्देश] प्रकट कसको मानिसहरू बाहेक, तपाईं अघि पठाउन [हे मुहम्मद], त्यसैले यदि तपाईं थाहा छैन सन्देश को सोध्छन्।

trans-unit.source: And We did not make the prophets forms not eating food, nor were they immortal [on earth].
trans-unit.target: र हामी प्रकारका खाना खाने छैन अगमवक्ताहरूलाई गर्नुभयो छैन, न त तिनीहरूले अमर [पृथ्वीमा] थिए।

trans-unit.source: Then We fulfilled for them the promise, and We saved them and whom We willed and destroyed the transgressors.
trans-unit.target: त्यसपछि हामी प्रतिज्ञा तिनीहरूलाई लागि पूरा, र हामी तिनीहरूलाई सुरक्षित र जसलाई हामी इरादों र transgressors नष्ट।

trans-unit.source: We have certainly sent down to you a Book in which is your mention. Then will you not reason?
trans-unit.target: हामी पक्कै पनि जो आफ्नो उल्लेख छ एक पुस्तक तपाईं तल पठाएको छ।

trans-unit.source: And how many a city which was unjust have We shattered and produced after it another people.
trans-unit.target: र अन्यायपूर्ण थियो जो शहर कति हामी भताभुंग र अर्को मान्छे पछि उत्पादन गरेको छ।

trans-unit.source: And when its inhabitants perceived Our punishment, at once they fled from it.
trans-unit.target: र त्यहाँका बासिन्दाहरूले हाम्रो सजाय कथित गर्दा एकैचोटि तिनीहरूले देखि भागे।

trans-unit.source: [Some angels said], "Do not flee but return to where you were given luxury and to your homes - perhaps you will be questioned."
trans-unit.target: [केही स्वर्गदूतहरू भने], "भाग्न तर तपाईं दिइएको थियो जहाँ लक्जरी गर्न र आफ्नो घरमा फर्कन नगर्नुहोस् -। सायद तपाईं प्रश्न गरिनेछ"

trans-unit.source: They said, "O woe to us! Indeed, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले "हामीलाई हे धिक्कार! वास्तवमा हामीले गल्ती थिए।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: And that declaration of theirs did not cease until We made them [as] a harvest [mowed down], extinguished [like a fire].
trans-unit.target: हामी उनीहरूलाई एक बाली [तल mowed] [रूपमा], [आगो जस्तै] निभाउँछ सम्म र तिनीहरूको को भनेर घोषणा बन्द गरेनन्।

trans-unit.source: And We did not create the heaven and earth and that between them in play.
trans-unit.target: र हामी प्ले तिनीहरूलाई बीच स्वर्ग र पृथ्वी र सिर्जना गरेनन्।

trans-unit.source: Had We intended to take a diversion, We could have taken it from [what is] with Us - if [indeed] We were to do so.
trans-unit.target: हामी एक मोड लिन अभिप्रेरित थियो, हामी हाम्रो साथ देखि [कुरा] यसको सक्थे - [साँच्चै] हामी त्यसो गर्न भने।

trans-unit.source: Rather, We dash the truth upon falsehood, and it destroys it, and thereupon it departs. And for you is destruction from that which you describe.
trans-unit.target: बरु, हामी falsehood मा सत्य ड्यास र यो नष्ट, र त्यसपछि यसलाई प्रस्थान।

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs whoever is in the heavens and the earth. And those near Him are not prevented by arrogance from His worship, nor do they tire.
trans-unit.target: उहाँलाई जसले आकाश र पृथ्वी मा छ पर्छ।

trans-unit.source: They exalt [Him] night and day [and] do not slacken.
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरू उच्च पार्ने [उहाँलाई] रात र दिन [र] ढिलासुस्ती छैन।

trans-unit.source: Or have men taken for themselves gods from the earth who resurrect [the dead]?
trans-unit.target: वा मानिसहरू पुनर्जीवित गर्ने पृथ्वी [मरेका] देखि देवताहरूको लागि लिएका छन्?

trans-unit.source: Had there been within the heavens and earth gods besides Allah, they both would have been ruined. So exalted is Allah, Lord of the Throne, above what they describe.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह बाहेक आकाश र पृथ्वी देवताहरूको भित्र त्यहाँ भएको थियो, तिनीहरू दुवै बर्बाद गरिएको थियो।

trans-unit.source: He is not questioned about what He does, but they will be questioned.
trans-unit.target: उहाँले बारेमा उहाँले गर्छ के प्रश्न छैन, तर तिनीहरूले प्रश्न गरिनेछ।

trans-unit.source: Or have they taken gods besides Him? Say, [O Muhammad], "Produce your proof. This [Qur'an] is the message for those with me and the message of those before me." But most of them do not know the truth, so they are turning away.
trans-unit.target: वा तिनीहरूले उहाँलाई बाहेक देवताहरूको लिएका छन्?

trans-unit.source: And We sent not before you any messenger except that We revealed to him that, "There is no deity except Me, so worship Me."
trans-unit.target: र हामी तपाईं अघि हामी, भनी प्रकट कि बाहेक कुनै पनि दूत पठाएको "मलाई बाहेक कुनै उहााको ईश्वरत्व छ, त्यसैले मलाई उपासना।"

trans-unit.source: And they say, "The Most Merciful has taken a son." Exalted is He! Rather, they are [but] honored servants.
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले "सबैभन्दा दयालु एक छोरा लिएको छ।" भन्न

trans-unit.source: They cannot precede Him in word, and they act by His command.
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरू शब्द मा उहाँलाई लिनुअघि गर्न सक्दैन, र तिनीहरूले उहाँको आज्ञा द्वारा कार्य।

trans-unit.source: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them, and they cannot intercede except on behalf of one whom He approves. And they, from fear of Him, are apprehensive.
trans-unit.target: उहाँले [वर्तमान] तिनीहरूलाई अघि के थाह छ र तिनीहरूलाई पछि के हुनेछ, र तिनीहरूले जसलाई उहाँले approves एक तर्फबाट बाहेक intercede गर्न सक्दैन।

trans-unit.source: And whoever of them should say, "Indeed, I am a god besides Him"- that one We would recompense with Hell. Thus do We recompense the wrongdoers.
trans-unit.target: र, ती जसले भन्नुपर्छ "वास्तवमा, म उहाँलाई बाहेक देवता हुँ" - एक हामी नरक संग recompense भनेर।

trans-unit.source: Have those who disbelieved not considered that the heavens and the earth were a joined entity, and We separated them and made from water every living thing? Then will they not believe?
trans-unit.target: आकाश र पृथ्वी सामेल कि थिए इकाइ, र हामी तिनीहरूलाई अलग र पानी सबै जीवित प्राणीहरूको बनाइएका छलफल गर्ने disbelieved छैन ती छ?

trans-unit.source: And We placed within the earth firmly set mountains, lest it should shift with them, and We made therein [mountain] passes [as] roads that they might be guided.
trans-unit.target: र हामी नत्र उनीहरूसँग पारी गर्नुपर्छ, दृढ पहाड सेट पृथ्वी भित्र राखिएको, र हामी यसमा [पहाड] बित्दै तिनीहरूले निर्देशित हुन सक्छ कि सडक [रूपमा] गरे।

trans-unit.source: And We made the sky a protected ceiling, but they, from its signs, are turning away.
trans-unit.target: र हामी आकाश सुरक्षित छत गरे, तर तिनीहरूले यसको संकेत देखि, दूर खोल्दै हुनुहुन्छ।

trans-unit.source: And it is He who created the night and the day and the sun and the moon; all [heavenly bodies] in an orbit are swimming.
trans-unit.target: र जसले रात र दिन र सूर्य र चन्द्र सिर्जना उहाँ;

trans-unit.source: And We did not grant to any man before you eternity [on earth]; so if you die - would they be eternal?
trans-unit.target: र हामी तपाईंलाई [पृथ्वीमा] सदाको अघि कुनै पनि मानिसलाई प्रदान गरेनन्;

trans-unit.source: Every soul will taste death. And We test you with evil and with good as trial; and to Us you will be returned.
trans-unit.target: हरेक प्राणी मृत्यु स्वाद हुनेछ।

trans-unit.source: And when those who disbelieve see you, [O Muhammad], they take you not except in ridicule, [saying], "Is this the one who insults your gods?" And they are, at the mention of the Most Merciful, disbelievers.
trans-unit.target: र जो disbelieve ती तपाईं देख्न गर्दा [हे मुहम्मद], तिनीहरूले तपाईं गिल्ला बाहेक ले, [भन्दै], "यो तपाईंको देवताहरूको अपमान गर्ने छ?"

trans-unit.source: Man was created of haste. I will show you My signs, so do not impatiently urge Me.
trans-unit.target: मानिस हतार को सिर्जना गरिएको थियो।

trans-unit.source: And they say, "When is this promise, if you should be truthful?"
trans-unit.target: र, "के तपाईं सत्यवादी हुनुपर्छ भने, यो प्रतिज्ञा छ" उनि भन्छन्

trans-unit.source: If those who disbelieved but knew the time when they will not avert the Fire from their faces or from their backs and they will not be aided...
trans-unit.target: disbelieved तर तिनीहरूले आफ्नो अनुहार देखि वा आफ्नो पीठ देखि आगो हटाउनु जब र तिनीहरू छैन सहायता प्राप्त हुनेछ समय थाह गर्नेहरूलाई भने ...

trans-unit.source: Rather, it will come to them unexpectedly and bewilder them, and they will not be able to repel it, nor will they be reprieved.
trans-unit.target: बरु, यो अप्रत्याशित रूपमा तिनीहरूलाई हुनेछ र तिनीहरूलाई bewilder, र तिनीहरूले घृणा उत्पन्न गर्न सक्षम हुने छैन, न त reprieved गरिनेछ।

trans-unit.source: And already were messengers ridiculed before you, but those who mocked them were enveloped by what they used to ridicule.
trans-unit.target: र तपाईंले पहिले नै अघि गिल्ला दूतहरूलाई थिए, तर तिनीहरूलाई mocked गर्नेहरूलाई तिनीहरूले गिल्ला गर्न प्रयोग के द्वारा enveloped थिए।

trans-unit.source: Say, "Who can protect you at night or by day from the Most Merciful?" But they are, from the remembrance of their Lord, turning away.
trans-unit.target: भन्छन्, "कसले सबैभन्दा दयालु देखि राती वा दिन तपाईं रक्षा गर्न सक्छन्?"

trans-unit.source: Or do they have gods to defend them other than Us? They are unable [even] to help themselves, nor can they be protected from Us.
trans-unit.target: अथवा तिनीहरू हामीलाई भन्दा तिनीहरूलाई अन्य पक्षमा देवताहरूको छन्?

trans-unit.source: But, [on the contrary], We have provided good things for these [disbelievers] and their fathers until life was prolonged for them. Then do they not see that We set upon the land, reducing it from its borders? So it is they who will overcome?
trans-unit.target: तर, [विपरीत], हामी राम्रो कुरा यी [disbelievers] को लागि प्रदान गर्नुभएको र जीवन सम्म आफ्नो पुर्खाहरूले तिनीहरूलाई लागि लामो समयसम्म थियो।

trans-unit.source: Say, "I only warn you by revelation." But the deaf do not hear the call when they are warned.
trans-unit.target: भन्छन्, "म मात्र प्रकाश तपाईंलाई चेतावनी दिनुहोस्।"

trans-unit.source: And if [as much as] a whiff of the punishment of your Lord should touch them, they would surely say, "O woe to us! Indeed, we have been wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: र यदि आफ्नो प्रभु को सजाय को एक whiff तिनीहरूलाई छुन गर्नुपर्छ [रूपमा धेरै रूपमा], तिनीहरूले पक्कै भन्नुहुन्छ, "हामीलाई हे धिक्कार! वास्तवमा हामीले गल्ती भएको छ।"

trans-unit.source: And We place the scales of justice for the Day of Resurrection, so no soul will be treated unjustly at all. And if there is [even] the weight of a mustard seed, We will bring it forth. And sufficient are We as accountant.
trans-unit.target: र हामी पुनरुत्थानको को दिन को लागि न्याय को तराजू ठाँउ, त कुनै प्राण बेमनासिब मा सबै उपचार गरिनेछ।

trans-unit.source: And We had already given Moses and Aaron the criterion and a light and a reminder for the righteous
trans-unit.target: र हामी पहिले नै मोशा र हारूनले धार्मिक लागि मापदण्ड र उज्यालो र एक रिमाइन्डर दिनुभएको थियो

trans-unit.source: Who fear their Lord unseen, while they are of the Hour apprehensive.
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले चिन्तित घन्टा को हुँदा कसले, आफ्नो प्रभु नदेखिने डर।

trans-unit.source: And this [Qur'an] is a blessed message which We have sent down. Then are you with it unacquainted?
trans-unit.target: र यो [कुरान] हामी तल पठाएको छ जो एक अनमोल सन्देश हो।

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly given Abraham his sound judgement before, and We were of him well-Knowing
trans-unit.target: र हामी पक्कै पनि अब्राहाम अघि आफ्नो ध्वनि न्याय दिनुभएको थियो, र हामी राम्ररी जानने उहाँलाई थिए

trans-unit.source: When he said to his father and his people, "What are these statues to which you are devoted?"
trans-unit.target: उहाँले आफ्नो बुबा र आफ्नो मान्छे भने कहिले, "तपाईं समर्पित छन् जो यी मूर्तिहरू के हुन्?"

trans-unit.source: They said, "We found our fathers worshippers of them."
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले "हामी तिनीहरूलाई हाम्रो पुर्खाहरूले उपासकहरू फेला परेन।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: He said, "You were certainly, you and your fathers, in manifest error."
trans-unit.target: उहाँले "तपाईं प्रकट त्रुटि, पक्कै पनि थिए तपाईं र तपाईंको पिता।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you come to us with truth, or are you of those who jest?"
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले "तपाईं सत्य हामीलाई आएको छ, वा तपाईँ जो हंसी ती को हुन्?", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: He said, "[No], rather, your Lord is the Lord of the heavens and the earth who created them, and I, to that, am of those who testify.
trans-unit.target: उहाँले [कुनै], बरु, आफ्नो प्रभु स्वर्गको प्रभु र जो तिनीहरूलाई सिर्जना पृथ्वी, र म, कि, जो पुष्टि ती को हूँ छ ", भन्नुभयो।

trans-unit.source: And [I swear] by Allah, I will surely plan against your idols after you have turned and gone away."
trans-unit.target: र अल्लाह द्वारा, म पक्कै आफ्नो मूर्तिहरू विरुद्ध तपाईं फर्केर गइसकेका छन् पछि योजना हुनेछ [म कसम]। "

trans-unit.source: So he made them into fragments, except a large one among them, that they might return to it [and question].
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले उहाँले तिनीहरूलाई टुकडे मा, तिनीहरूमध्ये एक ठूलो बाहेकको, तिनीहरूले [र प्रश्न] फर्कन सक्छ गरे।

trans-unit.source: They said, "Who has done this to our gods? Indeed, he is of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले "कसले उहाँले गल्ती छ, हाम्रो देवतालाई यस गरेको छ? वास्तवमा।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: They said, "We heard a young man mention them who is called Abraham."
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले "हामी सुने जवान अब्राहाम भनिन्छ जो तिनीहरूलाई उल्लेख गरे।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: They said, "Then bring him before the eyes of the people that they may testify."
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले "त्यसपछि तिनीहरूले पुष्टि हुन सक्छ कि मानिसहरूको आँखा अघि उहाँलाई ल्याउन।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: They said, "Have you done this to our gods, O Abraham?"
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले "तपाईं हाम्रो देवताहरूको हे अब्राहामलाई यस गरेको छ?", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: He said, "Rather, this - the largest of them - did it, so ask them, if they should [be able to] speak."
trans-unit.target: उहाँले, "- ती सबै भन्दा ठूलो - यो गरे, त्यसैले तिनीहरू बोल्न [गर्न सक्षम] गर्नुपर्छ भने, तिनीहरूलाई सोध्न। बरु, यो" भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: So they returned to [blaming] themselves and said [to each other], "Indeed, you are the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले तिनीहरू [blaming] आफूलाई फर्के र भने, [आपसमा] "वास्तवमा, तपाईं गल्ती हो।"

trans-unit.source: Then they reversed themselves, [saying], "You have already known that these do not speak!"
trans-unit.target: त्यसपछि तिनीहरू, [भन्दै] उल्टाउन "तपाईंले पहिले नै यी कुरा छैन कि ज्ञात छ!"

trans-unit.source: He said, "Then do you worship instead of Allah that which does not benefit you at all or harm you?
trans-unit.target: उहाँले त्यसपछि तपाईं अल्लाह को सट्टा सबै मा तपाईं लाभ उठाउन वा हानि गर्छ जो तपाईं उपासना ", भन्नुभयो?

trans-unit.source: Uff to you and to what you worship instead of Allah. Then will you not use reason?"
trans-unit.target: तपाईं Uff र तपाईं अल्लाह को सट्टा उपासना के।

trans-unit.source: They said, "Burn him and support your gods - if you are to act."
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले "। - तपाईं कार्य गर्ने हो भने उसलाई जला र आफ्नो देवताको समर्थन", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: Allah said, "O fire, be coolness and safety upon Abraham."
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह "हे आगो, मा अब्राहाम ठंडक र सुरक्षा हुन।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: And they intended for him harm, but We made them the greatest losers.
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले उहाँलाई हानि लागि अभिप्रेरित, तर हामी तिनीहरूलाई सबैभन्दा ठूलो हारे गरे।

trans-unit.source: And We delivered him and Lot to the land which We had blessed for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: र हामी दुनिया आशिष् थियो जो देशमा उसलाई र लट बुझाइएको।

trans-unit.source: And We gave him Isaac and Jacob in addition, and all [of them] We made righteous.
trans-unit.target: र हामी वाहेक उहाँलाई इसहाक र याकूबलाई दिए, र [तिनीहरूलाई] सबै हामी धार्मिक गरे।

trans-unit.source: And We made them leaders guiding by Our command. And We inspired to them the doing of good deeds, establishment of prayer, and giving of zakah; and they were worshippers of Us.
trans-unit.target: र हामी तिनीहरूलाई हाम्रो आदेश द्वारा मार्गदर्शक नेताहरूले गरे।

trans-unit.source: And to Lot We gave judgement and knowledge, and We saved him from the city that was committing wicked deeds. Indeed, they were a people of evil, defiantly disobedient.
trans-unit.target: र लट गर्न हामी न्याय र ज्ञान दिनुभयो र हामी दुष्ट कामहरू Committing थियो शहर उहाँलाई सुरक्षित गरियो।

trans-unit.source: And We admitted him into Our mercy. Indeed, he was of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: र हामी हाम्रो कृपा मा उहाँलाई स्वीकारे।

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Noah, when he called [to Allah] before [that time], so We responded to him and saved him and his family from the great flood.
trans-unit.target: र [उल्लेख] नूह, उहाँले [अल्लाह] अगाडि [समय] भनिन्छ जब, त्यसैले हामी उहाँलाई प्रतिक्रिया र तिनलाई र ठूलो बाढी आफ्नो परिवार सुरक्षित गरियो।

trans-unit.source: And We saved him from the people who denied Our signs. Indeed, they were a people of evil, so We drowned them, all together.
trans-unit.target: र हामी जो हाम्रो संकेत अस्वीकार मानिसहरूलाई उहाँलाई सुरक्षित गरियो।

trans-unit.source: And [mention] David and Solomon, when they judged concerning the field - when the sheep of a people overran it [at night], and We were witness to their judgement.
trans-unit.target: [उल्लेख] दाऊद र सुलेमान र, तिनीहरूले क्षेत्र सम्बन्धमा न्याय गर्दा - एक मान्छे को भेडा यो overran जब [राति], र हामी आफ्नो न्याय गर्न साक्षी थिए।

trans-unit.source: And We gave understanding of the case to Solomon, and to each [of them] We gave judgement and knowledge. And We subjected the mountains to exalt [Us], along with David and [also] the birds. And We were doing [that].
trans-unit.target: र हामी सुलेमानलाई मामला समझ दिनुभयो, र [तिनीहरूलाई] प्रत्येक हामी न्याय र ज्ञान दिनुभयो।

trans-unit.source: And We taught him the fashioning of coats of armor to protect you from your [enemy in] battle. So will you then be grateful?
trans-unit.target: र हामी तपाईंको युद्धमा [मा शत्रु] बाट रक्षा गर्न उहाँलाई अस्त्रको कोट को fashioning सिकाउनुभयो।

trans-unit.source: And to Solomon [We subjected] the wind, blowing forcefully, proceeding by his command toward the land which We had blessed. And We are ever, of all things, Knowing.
trans-unit.target: र सुलेमानलाई [हामी अधीनमा] हावा, forcefully, उड्ने आफ्नो आदेश द्वारा बढ्नु हामी आशिष् थियो जो देशमा तिर।

trans-unit.source: And of the devils were those who dived for him and did work other than that. And We were of them a guardian.
trans-unit.target: र धर उहाँलाई लागि भन्दा अन्य काम dived र गरे गर्नेहरूलाई थिए।

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Job, when he called to his Lord, "Indeed, adversity has touched me, and you are the Most Merciful of the merciful."
trans-unit.target: र [उल्लेख] अय्यूब, उहाँले आफ्नो प्रभु बोलाउँदा, "वास्तवमा, कठिनाइहरू मलाई छोयो छ, र तपाईं कृपालु सबैभन्दा दयालु छन्।"

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him and removed what afflicted him of adversity. And We gave him [back] his family and the like thereof with them as mercy from Us and a reminder for the worshippers [of Allah].
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले हामी उहाँलाई प्रतिक्रिया र कठिनाइहरू तिनलाई दुःख के हटाइयो।

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Ishmael and Idrees and Dhul-Kifl; all were of the patient.
trans-unit.target: र [उल्लेख] इश्माएलप्रति र Idrees र Dhul-Kifl;

trans-unit.source: And We admitted them into Our mercy. Indeed, they were of the righteous.
trans-unit.target: र हामी हाम्रो कृपा तिनीहरूलाई स्वीकारे।

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the man of the fish, when he went off in anger and thought that We would not decree [anything] upon him. And he called out within the darknesses, "There is no deity except You; exalted are You. Indeed, I have been of the wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: अनि उहाँले रिसाएर बन्द भयो र लाग्यो जब [उल्लेख] माछा मानिस, कि हामीले उर्दी गर्थे [केहि] उहाँमाथि।

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him and saved him from the distress. And thus do We save the believers.
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले हामी उहाँलाई प्रतिक्रिया र दुःखको उहाँलाई सुरक्षित गरियो।

trans-unit.source: And [mention] Zechariah, when he called to his Lord, "My Lord, do not leave me alone [with no heir], while you are the best of inheritors."
trans-unit.target: र [उल्लेख] जकरिया, उहाँले आफ्नो प्रभु बोलाउँदा, "मेरो प्रभु, मलाई एक्लै [कुनै हकदार संग], तपाईं inheritors को सबै भन्दा राम्रो हुँदा नछोड।"

trans-unit.source: So We responded to him, and We gave to him John, and amended for him his wife. Indeed, they used to hasten to good deeds and supplicate Us in hope and fear, and they were to Us humbly submissive.
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले हामी उहाँलाई प्रतिक्रिया, र हामी उहाँको यूहन्ना पत्नी दिनुभयो, र उहाँलाई लागि संशोधन।

trans-unit.source: And [mention] the one who guarded her chastity, so We blew into her [garment] through Our angel [Gabriel], and We made her and her son a sign for the worlds.
trans-unit.target: र [उल्लेख] हामी हाम्रो दूत [गब्रिएल] मार्फत उनको [लुगा] मा उडायो, र हामी दुनिया लागि उनको र उनको छोरा एक साइन गरे त, उनको नैतिक शुद्धता सुरक्षा गर्ने एक।

trans-unit.source: Indeed this, your religion, is one religion, and I am your Lord, so worship Me.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा यो, आफ्नो धर्म, एक धर्म छ, र म आफ्नो प्रभु हुँ, त्यसैले मलाई उपासना।

trans-unit.source: And [yet] they divided their affair among themselves, [but] all to Us will return.
trans-unit.target: र [अझै] तिनीहरूले सम्बन्ध आपसमा, विभाजित [तर] हाम्रो सबै फिर्ता हुनेछ।

trans-unit.source: So whoever does righteous deeds while he is a believer - no denial will there be for his effort, and indeed We, of it, are recorders.
trans-unit.target: उहाँले एक विश्वासीले हुँदा त जसले धार्मिक कामहरू गर्छ - कुनै इन्कार उहाँको प्रयास हुनेछ, र साँच्चै हामी, यो, रेकर्डर छन्।

trans-unit.source: And there is prohibition upon [the people of] a city which We have destroyed that they will [ever] return
trans-unit.target: र मा जो हामी नष्ट छन् तिनीहरूले हुनेछ [कहिल्यै] फिर्ती एक शहर [को मान्छे] निषेध छ

trans-unit.source: Until when [the dam of] Gog and Magog has been opened and they, from every elevation, descend
trans-unit.target: सम्म गोगको र Magog [को बाँध] खोल्न गरिएको गर्दा र उनि, हरेक उचाइ देखि, धमकना

trans-unit.source: And [when] the true promise has approached; then suddenly the eyes of those who disbelieved will be staring [in horror, while they say], "O woe to us; we had been unmindful of this; rather, we were wrongdoers."
trans-unit.target: र [गर्दा] साँचो प्रतिज्ञा नजिक छ;

trans-unit.source: Indeed, you [disbelievers] and what you worship other than Allah are the firewood of Hell. You will be coming to [enter] it.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा, तपाईं [disbelievers] र के तपाईं अल्लाह भन्दा अन्य उपासना नरक को दाउरा छन्।

trans-unit.source: Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein.
trans-unit.target: यी [झूटा देवताहरूका] भएको [वास्तविक] देवताहरूको थियो, तिनीहरूले गर्न आएका छन्, तर सबै यसमा अनन्त छन्।

trans-unit.source: For them therein is heavy sighing, and they therein will not hear.
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूलाई लागि यसमा भारी शोक छ, र तिनीहरूले यसमा सुन्नुहुने छैन।

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those for whom the best [reward] has preceded from Us - they are from it far removed.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा, सबै भन्दा राम्रो [इनाम] हाम्रो बाट preceded छ जसको लागि ती - तिनीहरूले टाढा हटाइएको छन्।

trans-unit.source: They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally.
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरू गर्दै छन्, कि जो अनन्तको पालन, आफ्नो प्राण इच्छा छ, यसको ध्वनि सुन्न छैन।

trans-unit.source: They will not be grieved by the greatest terror, and the angels will meet them, [saying], "This is your Day which you have been promised" -
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले सबैभन्दा ठूलो आतंक द्वारा दुःखित हुनेछ, र स्वर्गदूतहरू [भन्दै], "यो तपाईं प्रतिज्ञा गरिएको छ जो आफ्नो दिन छ", तिनीहरूलाई पूरा हुनेछ -

trans-unit.source: The Day when We will fold the heaven like the folding of a [written] sheet for the records. As We began the first creation, We will repeat it. [That is] a promise binding upon Us. Indeed, We will do it.
trans-unit.target: दिन जब हामी रेकर्ड लागि [लिखित] पाना को तह जस्तै स्वर्गमा गुना हुनेछ।

trans-unit.source: And We have already written in the book [of Psalms] after the [previous] mention that the land [of Paradise] is inherited by My righteous servants.
trans-unit.target: र हामी पहिले नै पछि [भजनको] पुस्तकमा लेखिएको गर्नुभएको [अघिल्लो] [प्रमोदवनमा को] देशमा मेरो धार्मिक सेवक जन्मजात छ उल्लेख गरे।

trans-unit.source: Indeed, in this [Qur'an] is notification for a worshipping people.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा, यो मा [कुरान] एक उपासना मान्छे को लागि सूचना छ।

trans-unit.source: And We have not sent you, [O Muhammad], except as a mercy to the worlds.
trans-unit.target: र हामी बाहेक दुनिया एक कृपा रूपमा, [हे मुहम्मद] पठाएको छैन।

trans-unit.source: Say, "It is only revealed to me that your god is but one God; so will you be Muslims [in submission to Him]?"
trans-unit.target: भन्छन्, "यो केवल मलाई मात्र प्रकट गरिएको छ तपाईंको भगवान एक परमेश्वरको तर छ कि; त्यसैले तपाईं [उहाँलाई पेश्की मा] मुस्लिम हुनेछ?"

trans-unit.source: But if they turn away, then say, "I have announced to [all of] you equally. And I know not whether near or far is that which you are promised.
trans-unit.target: तर तिनीहरू त्यागेर भने, "म उत्तिकै गर्न [सबै] तपाईं घोषणा गरेका छन् भन्छन्। अनि म नजिकै वा टाढा तपाईं प्रतिज्ञा गर्दै जो कि छ कि छैन भनेर थाहा छैन।

trans-unit.source: Indeed, He knows what is declared of speech, and He knows what you conceal.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा, उहाँले के बोलीको घोषणा गरिएको छ थाह छ, र उहाँले तपाईंलाई के लुकाउन थाह छ।

trans-unit.source: And I know not; perhaps it is a trial for you and enjoyment for a time."
trans-unit.target: र मलाई थाहा छैन;

trans-unit.source: [The Prophet] has said, "My Lord, judge [between us] in truth. And our Lord is the Most Merciful, the one whose help is sought against that which you describe."
trans-unit.target: [अगमवक्ता] भन्नुभयो छ, "मेरो प्रभु, [हामीलाई बीच] सत्यतामा न्यायाधीश। अनि हाम्रा प्रभु सबैभन्दा, दयालु एक जसको मद्दत वर्णन जो कि विरुद्ध खोजे छ।"

trans-unit.source: O mankind, fear your Lord. Indeed, the convulsion of the [final] Hour is a terrible thing.
trans-unit.target: हे मानिसजातिको, आफ्नो प्रभु डर।

trans-unit.source: On the Day you see it every nursing mother will be distracted from that [child] she was nursing, and every pregnant woman will abort her pregnancy, and you will see the people [appearing] intoxicated while they are not intoxicated; but the punishment of Allah is severe.
trans-unit.target: तपाईं हरेक नवजात शिशुको आमाले कि [बच्चा] बाट विचलित गरिनेछ त्यो नर्सिङ थियो, र हरेक गर्भवती महिला उनको गर्भावस्था परित्याग हुनेछ, र तपाईंले मानिसहरूलाई [देखा] देख्ने मत तिनीहरूले मत छैन हुँदा यसलाई हेर्न दिन;

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge and follows every rebellious devil.
trans-unit.target: र मान्छे को उहाँले ज्ञान बिना अल्लाह बारेमा विवाद र हरेक विद्रोही शैतानको निम्नानुसार गर्ने छ।

trans-unit.source: It has been decreed for every devil that whoever turns to him - he will misguide him and will lead him to the punishment of the Blaze.
trans-unit.target: उहाँले misguide हुनेछ र ब्लेज को सजाय उसलाई नेतृत्व गर्नेछन् - यो कि जसले उसलाई उत्तेजित गर्दछ हरेक शैतानको लागि आदेश गरिएको छ।

trans-unit.source: O People, if you should be in doubt about the Resurrection, then [consider that] indeed, We created you from dust, then from a sperm-drop, then from a clinging clot, and then from a lump of flesh, formed and unformed - that We may show you. And We settle in the wombs whom We will for a specified term, then We bring you out as a child, and then [We develop you] that you may reach your [time of] maturity. And among you is he who is taken in [early] death, and among you is he who is returned to the most decrepit [old] age so that he knows, after [once having] knowledge, nothing. And you see the earth barren, but when We send down upon it rain, it quivers and swells and grows [something] of every beautiful kind.
trans-unit.target: हे मानिसहरू, तपाईं पुनरुत्थानको बारेमा शङ्का हुनुपर्छ भने, त्यसपछि साँच्चै, हामी धूलो तपाईं सिर्जना त्यसपछि शुक्राणु ड्रप देखि, त्यसपछि एक clinging थक्का देखि शरीर को एक गांठ देखि गठन र unformed [भनेर विचार], र त्यसपछि,

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth and because He gives life to the dead and because He is over all things competent
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह सत्य छ किनभने त्यो हो किनभने उहाँले मरेका जीवन दिन्छ किनभने उहाँले योग्य र सबै कुराहरू माथि छ

trans-unit.source: And [that they may know] that the Hour is coming - no doubt about it - and that Allah will resurrect those in the graves.
trans-unit.target: र [तिनीहरूले थाहा हुन सक्छ कि] घन्टा आउँदै छ कि - यो बारेमा कुनै शंका - र अल्लाह चिहानहरू ती पुनरुत्थान गर्नुहुनेछ।

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who disputes about Allah without knowledge or guidance or an enlightening book [from Him],
trans-unit.target: र मान्छे को ज्ञान वा निर्देशन वा enlightening पुस्तक [उहाँबाट] बिना अल्लाह बारेमा विवाद जसले छ,

trans-unit.source: Twisting his neck [in arrogance] to mislead [people] from the way of Allah. For him in the world is disgrace, and We will make him taste on the Day of Resurrection the punishment of the Burning Fire [while it is said],
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह को बाटो बाट [मान्छे] बहकाउन [अहङ्कारको मा] आफ्नो घाँटी घुमाई।

trans-unit.source: "That is for what your hands have put forth and because Allah is not ever unjust to [His] servants."
trans-unit.target: "त्यो आफ्नो हात अगाडी राखे के को लागि हो र अल्लाह [उहाँको] सेवकहरूलाई कहिल्यै अन्यायपूर्ण छैन किनभने।"

trans-unit.source: And of the people is he who worships Allah on an edge. If he is touched by good, he is reassured by it; but if he is struck by trial, he turns on his face [to the other direction]. He has lost [this] world and the Hereafter. That is what is the manifest loss.
trans-unit.target: र मान्छे को त्यो एक किनारा मा अल्लाह उपासना गर्ने छ।

trans-unit.source: He invokes instead of Allah that which neither harms him nor benefits him. That is what is the extreme error.
trans-unit.target: उहाँले न उहाँलाई न त फाइदा उहाँलाई नोकसान पुग्छ जो कि अल्लाह को सट्टा invokes।

trans-unit.source: He invokes one whose harm is closer than his benefit - how wretched the protector and how wretched the associate.
trans-unit.target: Wretched कसरी रक्षक र कसरी Wretched को एसोसिएट - उहाँले एक जसको हानि आफ्नो लाभ भन्दा नजिक छ invokes।

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. Indeed, Allah does what He intends.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा, अल्लाह विश्वास र नदी प्रवाह जो तल उद्यानमा धार्मिक कामहरू गर्नेहरूलाई स्वीकार गर्नेछ।

trans-unit.source: Whoever should think that Allah will not support [Prophet Muhammad] in this world and the Hereafter - let him extend a rope to the ceiling, then cut off [his breath], and let him see: will his effort remove that which enrages [him]?
trans-unit.target: जसले अल्लाह समर्थन गर्ने छैन यस संसारमा [अगमवक्ता मुहम्मद] र अगाडी हिड विचार गर्नुपर्छ - उहाँलाई छत एक डोरी विस्तार गरौं, त्यसपछि नष्ट [आफ्नो सास], र उहाँलाई हेर्न गरौं: उहाँलाई आफ्नो प्रयास enrages जो कि हटाउने [

trans-unit.source: And thus have We sent the Qur'an down as verses of clear evidence and because Allah guides whom He intends.
trans-unit.target: र यसरी हामी स्पष्ट प्रमाण को पद रूपमा तल कुरान पठाएको र अल्लाह उहाँले जसलाई चाहन्छ गाइड किनभने छन्।

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have believed and those who were Jews and the Sabeans and the Christians and the Magians and those who associated with Allah - Allah will judge between them on the Day of Resurrection. Indeed Allah is, over all things, Witness.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा, र विश्वास भएकाहरूलाई जो यहूदीहरू र Sabeans र मसीहीहरूले र Magians र अल्लाह संग सम्बन्धित गर्नेहरूलाई थिए ती - अल्लाह पुनरुत्थान को दिन मा तिनीहरूलाई बीच इन्साफ गर्नुहुनेछ।

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that to Allah prostrates whoever is in the heavens and whoever is on the earth and the sun, the moon, the stars, the mountains, the trees, the moving creatures and many of the people? But upon many the punishment has been justified. And he whom Allah humiliates - for him there is no bestower of honor. Indeed, Allah does what He wills.
trans-unit.target: तपाईं अल्लाह कि जसले स्वर्गमा छ र जसले पृथ्वी र सूर्य, चन्द्र, ताराहरू, हिमालहरू, पेड, को सार्दा प्राणीहरू र धेरै मान्छे को छ prostrates हेर्न छैन?

trans-unit.source: These are two adversaries who have disputed over their Lord. But those who disbelieved will have cut out for them garments of fire. Poured upon their heads will be scalding water
trans-unit.target: यी आफ्नो प्रभु भन्दा विवाद गर्ने दुई विरोधीहरू छन्।

trans-unit.source: By which is melted that within their bellies and [their] skins.
trans-unit.target: जो आफ्नो bellies भित्र पग्लियो छ र [आफ्नो] खाल।

trans-unit.source: And for [striking] them are maces of iron.
trans-unit.target: र को लागि [जिते] तिनीहरूलाई फलाम को maces छन्।

trans-unit.source: Every time they want to get out of Hellfire from anguish, they will be returned to it, and [it will be said], "Taste the punishment of the Burning Fire!"
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले वेदना देखि नरकको आगोजस्ता बाहिर प्राप्त गर्न चाहनुहुन्छ हरेक समय, तिनीहरूले फर्के गरिनेछ, र [यो भने गरिनेछ], "बलिरहेको आगोको दण्ड स्वाद!"

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah will admit those who believe and do righteous deeds to gardens beneath which rivers flow. They will be adorned therein with bracelets of gold and pearl, and their garments therein will be silk.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा, अल्लाह विश्वास र नदी प्रवाह जो तल उद्यानमा धार्मिक कामहरू गर्नेहरूलाई स्वीकार गर्नेछ।

trans-unit.source: And they had been guided [in worldly life] to good speech, and they were guided to the path of the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले राम्रो भाषण गर्न [सांसारिक जीवनमा] निर्देशित गरिएको थियो, र तिनीहरूले प्रशंसनीय को पथमा निर्देशित थिए।

trans-unit.source: Indeed, those who have disbelieved and avert [people] from the way of Allah and [from] al-Masjid al-Haram, which We made for the people - equal are the resident therein and one from outside; and [also] whoever intends [a deed] therein of deviation [in religion] or wrongdoing - We will make him taste of a painful punishment.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा, disbelieved गर्ने गरेका छन् र ती अल्लाह र बाटो [मानिसहरूका] हटाउनु [बाट] अल-मस्जिद मानिसहरूको लागि हामी गरे जो अल-Haram, - बराबर यसमा पनि निवासी र एक बाहिरका छन्;

trans-unit.source: And [mention, O Muhammad], when We designated for Abraham the site of the House, [saying], "Do not associate anything with Me and purify My House for those who perform Tawaf and those who stand [in prayer] and those who bow and prostrate.
trans-unit.target: र [उल्लेख हे मुहम्मद], घर को अब्राहाम साइट हामी नियुक्त गर्दा, [भन्दै], "मसँग केहि सम्बद्ध नगर्नुहोस् र र खडा गर्ने [प्रार्थनामा] र Tawaf प्रदर्शन गर्नेहरूलाई ती गर्नेहरूका लागि मेरो घर शुद्ध

trans-unit.source: And proclaim to the people the Hajj [pilgrimage]; they will come to you on foot and on every lean camel; they will come from every distant pass -
trans-unit.target: र मानिसहरूलाई घोषणा गर्ने Hajj [तिर्थयात्रा];

trans-unit.source: That they may witness benefits for themselves and mention the name of Allah on known days over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. So eat of them and feed the miserable and poor.
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरू लागि लाभ साक्षी र उहाँले [बलिदानको] जनावर तिनीहरूलाई लागि प्रदान गरेको छ के भन्दा ज्ञात दिन मा अल्लाह को नाम उल्लेख सक्छ।

trans-unit.source: Then let them end their untidiness and fulfill their vows and perform Tawaf around the ancient House."
trans-unit.target: त्यसपछि तिनीहरूको untidiness अन्त र आफ्नो भाकल पूरा र पुरातन हाउस वरिपरि Tawaf प्रदर्शन गरौं। "

trans-unit.source: That [has been commanded], and whoever honors the sacred ordinances of Allah - it is best for him in the sight of his Lord. And permitted to you are the grazing livestock, except what is recited to you. So avoid the uncleanliness of idols and avoid false statement,
trans-unit.target: त्यो [आज्ञा गरिएको], र जसले अल्लाह को पवित्र नियमहरूले सम्मान - यो आफ्नो प्रभु को दृष्टि उहाँलाई लागि सबै भन्दा राम्रो छ।

trans-unit.source: Inclining [only] to Allah, not associating [anything] with Him. And he who associates with Allah - it is as though he had fallen from the sky and was snatched by the birds or the wind carried him down into a remote place.
trans-unit.target: Inclining [मात्र] अल्लाह, उहाँलाई साथ [केहि] सम्बद्ध छैन।

trans-unit.source: That [is so]. And whoever honors the symbols of Allah - indeed, it is from the piety of hearts.
trans-unit.target: त्यो [यति छ]।

trans-unit.source: For you the animals marked for sacrifice are benefits for a specified term; then their place of sacrifice is at the ancient House.
trans-unit.target: तपाईं लागि जनावर बलिदान निर्दिष्ट अवधि लागि लाभ छन् लागि चिन्ह;

trans-unit.source: And for all religion We have appointed a rite [of sacrifice] that they may mention the name of Allah over what He has provided for them of [sacrificial] animals. For your god is one God, so to Him submit. And, [O Muhammad], give good tidings to the humble [before their Lord]
trans-unit.target: र सबै धर्म लागि हामी [बलिदानको] एक अनुष्ठान तिनीहरूले उहाँ [बलिदानको] जनावर तिनीहरूलाई लागि प्रदान गरेको छ के भन्दा अल्लाह को नाम उल्लेख गर्न सक्छ भन्ने नियुक्त गरेका छन्।

trans-unit.source: Who, when Allah is mentioned, their hearts are fearful, and [to] the patient over what has afflicted them, and the establishers of prayer and those who spend from what We have provided them.
trans-unit.target: कसले, अल्लाह उल्लेख गरिएको छ जब उनको दिल डराएका छन्, र [गर्न] तिनीहरूलाई दुःख छ के भन्दा रोगी, र प्रार्थना को establishers र हामी तिनीहरूलाई प्रदान के बाट खर्च गर्नेहरूलाई।

trans-unit.source: And the camels and cattle We have appointed for you as among the symbols of Allah; for you therein is good. So mention the name of Allah upon them when lined up [for sacrifice]; and when they are [lifeless] on their sides, then eat from them and feed the needy and the beggar. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may be grateful.
trans-unit.target: र हामी अल्लाह को प्रतीक बीचमा रूपमा लागि नियुक्त गरेको ऊँटहरू र गाई;

trans-unit.source: Their meat will not reach Allah, nor will their blood, but what reaches Him is piety from you. Thus have We subjected them to you that you may glorify Allah for that [to] which He has guided you; and give good tidings to the doers of good.
trans-unit.target: उनको मासु अल्लाह पुग्न छैन, न त तिनीहरूको रगत, तर के उहाँलाई पुग्छ तिमी देखि piety छ।

trans-unit.source: Indeed, Allah defends those who have believed. Indeed, Allah does not like everyone treacherous and ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा, अल्लाह विश्वास भएकाहरूलाई बचाव।

trans-unit.source: Permission [to fight] has been given to those who are being fought, because they were wronged. And indeed, Allah is competent to give them victory.
trans-unit.target: किनभने उनीहरू पढेलेखेका थिए [लड्न] अनुमति, लडे भइरहेका छन् गर्नेहरूलाई दिइएको छ।

trans-unit.source: [They are] those who have been evicted from their homes without right - only because they say, "Our Lord is Allah." And were it not that Allah checks the people, some by means of others, there would have been demolished monasteries, churches, synagogues, and mosques in which the name of Allah is much mentioned. And Allah will surely support those who support Him. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: [ती हुन्] सही बिना आफ्नो घरमा देखि evicted गरिएको भएकाहरूलाई - मात्र किनभने तिनीहरूले भन्छन्, "हाम्रो प्रभु अल्लाह छ।"

trans-unit.source: [And they are] those who, if We give them authority in the land, establish prayer and give zakah and enjoin what is right and forbid what is wrong. And to Allah belongs the outcome of [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: [अनि तिनीहरू] हामी देशमा तिनीहरूलाई अधिकार दिन भने जो, ती, प्रार्थना स्थापना र zakah दिन र सही छ के हुक्म चलान र के गलत छ निषेध गरेको छ।

trans-unit.source: And if they deny you, [O Muhammad] - so, before them, did the people of Noah and 'Aad and Thamud deny [their prophets],
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले तपाईंलाई अस्वीकार भने, [हे मुहम्मद] - त्यसैले तिनीहरूलाई अघि नूह र 'Aad र Thamud अस्वीकार [आफ्नो अगमवक्ताहरू] को मान्छे, गरे

trans-unit.source: And the people of Abraham and the people of Lot
trans-unit.target: र अब्राहामको मान्छे र लट को मान्छे

trans-unit.source: And the inhabitants of Madyan. And Moses was denied, so I prolonged enjoyment for the disbelievers; then I seized them, and how [terrible] was My reproach.
trans-unit.target: र Madyan बासिन्दाहरूलाई।

trans-unit.source: And how many a city did We destroy while it was committing wrong - so it is [now] fallen into ruin - and [how many] an abandoned well and [how many] a lofty palace.
trans-unit.target: र शहर यसलाई गलत Committing बेला हामी नाश कति गरे - यो छ त [अब] नष्ट मा खसेको - र [कति] एक राम्रो त्यागेर [कति] एक उच्च दरबारमा।

trans-unit.source: So have they not traveled through the earth and have hearts by which to reason and ears by which to hear? For indeed, it is not eyes that are blinded, but blinded are the hearts which are within the breasts.
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले तिनीहरू जो सुन्न पृथ्वीको मार्फत यात्रा र तर्क गर्ने हृदय र कान छ छ?

trans-unit.source: And they urge you to hasten the punishment. But Allah will never fail in His promise. And indeed, a day with your Lord is like a thousand years of those which you count.
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले तपाईंलाई सजाय hasten गर्न आग्रह।

trans-unit.source: And for how many a city did I prolong enjoyment while it was committing wrong. Then I seized it, and to Me is the [final] destination.
trans-unit.target: र शहर म आनन्दको लम्ब्याउनु गरे कति लागि गर्दा यो गलत Committing थियो।

trans-unit.source: Say, "O people, I am only to you a clear warner."
trans-unit.target: "म मात्र स्पष्ट वार्नर तपाईं छु हे मान्छे,।", भन्न

trans-unit.source: And those who have believed and done righteous deeds - for them is forgiveness and noble provision.
trans-unit.target: र धार्मिक कामहरू विश्वास र गरेका गर्नेहरूलाई - तिनीहरूलाई लागि क्षमा र महान प्रावधान छ।

trans-unit.source: But the ones who strove against Our verses, [seeking] to cause failure - those are the companions of Hellfire.
trans-unit.target: तर हाम्रो पदहरू विरुद्ध हरसम्भव प्रयत्न गर्ने व्यक्तिहरूलाई, कारण [खोजी] गर्न विफलता - ती नरकको आगोजस्ता को साथीहरू छन्।

trans-unit.source: And We did not send before you any messenger or prophet except that when he spoke [or recited], Satan threw into it [some misunderstanding]. But Allah abolishes that which Satan throws in; then Allah makes precise His verses. And Allah is Knowing and Wise.
trans-unit.target: र हामी तपाईंलाई अघि उहाँले बताउनुभयो [वा recited] जब शैतानले यसलाई [केही गलतफहमीले] मा फाले भनेर बाहेक कुनै पनि दूत वा अगमवक्ता पठाउन गर्नुभयो।

trans-unit.source: [That is] so He may make what Satan throws in a trial for those within whose hearts is disease and those hard of heart. And indeed, the wrongdoers are in extreme dissension.
trans-unit.target: [छ] त्यसैले उहाँले शैतानलाई जसको हृदय रोग र हृदयको हार्ड ती छ भित्र ती लागि एक परीक्षण मा फेंकता के बनाउन सक्छ।

trans-unit.source: And so those who were given knowledge may know that it is the truth from your Lord and [therefore] believe in it, and their hearts humbly submit to it. And indeed is Allah the Guide of those who have believed to a straight path.
trans-unit.target: र यति ज्ञान दिइएको थियो गर्नेहरूलाई यो आफ्नो प्रभु देखि सत्य हो कि र यो मा [यसकारण] विश्वास र तिनीहरूको हृदय नम्र भई यसलाई पेश थाहा हुन सक्छ।

trans-unit.source: But those who disbelieve will not cease to be in doubt of it until the Hour comes upon them unexpectedly or there comes to them the punishment of a barren Day.
trans-unit.target: तर disbelieve गर्ने बन्द छैन ती यो पक्कै मा घण्टा अकस्मात तिनीहरूमाथि आउँछ वा तिनीहरूलाई त्यहाँ आउँछ एउटा बाँझो दिन को सजाय सम्म हुन।

trans-unit.source: [All] sovereignty that Day is for Allah; He will judge between them. So they who believed and did righteous deeds will be in the Gardens of Pleasure.
trans-unit.target: [सबै] दिन अल्लाह लागि हो कि सार्वभौमिकता;

trans-unit.source: And they who disbelieved and denied Our signs - for those there will be a humiliating punishment.
trans-unit.target: र disbelieved गर्ने र हाम्रो संकेत अस्वीकार तिनीहरूले - ती लागि एक अपमानजनक सजाय हुनेछ।

trans-unit.source: And those who emigrated for the cause of Allah and then were killed or died - Allah will surely provide for them a good provision. And indeed, it is Allah who is the best of providers.
trans-unit.target: र अल्लाह को कारण लागि emigrated गर्ने र त्यसपछि हत्या वा मृत्यु भए ती - अल्लाह पक्कै राम्रो प्रबन्ध तिनीहरूलाई लागि प्रदान गर्नेछ।

trans-unit.source: He will surely cause them to enter an entrance with which they will be pleased, and indeed, Allah is Knowing and Forbearing.
trans-unit.target: उहाँले तिनीहरूलाई तिनीहरूले खुसी हुने एउटा प्रवेश प्रविष्ट गर्न पक्कै कारण हुनेछ, र साँच्चै, अल्लाह थाह भएकोले र Forbearing छ।

trans-unit.source: That [is so]. And whoever responds [to injustice] with the equivalent of that with which he was harmed and then is tyrannized - Allah will surely aid him. Indeed, Allah is Pardoning and Forgiving.
trans-unit.target: त्यो [यति छ]।

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night and because Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह दिन प्रवेश गर्न रात गराउँछ किनभने र रात प्रवेश गर्न दिन ल्याउँछ र अल्लाह सुनेर र देखेर छ किनभने छ।

trans-unit.source: That is because Allah is the Truth, and that which they call upon other than Him is falsehood, and because Allah is the Most High, the Grand.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह सत्य छ किनभने, र तिनीहरूले उहाँलाई भन्दा अन्य पुकारा जो कि falsehood छ, र त्यो हो किनभने अल्लाह सबैभन्दा उच्च, महान् छ।

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has sent down rain from the sky and the earth becomes green? Indeed, Allah is Subtle and Acquainted.
trans-unit.target: तपाईं अल्लाह आकाशबाट तल वर्षा पठाइएको र पृथ्वी हरियो बन छ भनेर बुझ्न छैन?

trans-unit.source: To Him belongs what is in the heavens and what is on the earth. And indeed, Allah is the Free of need, the Praiseworthy.
trans-unit.target: उहाँलाई स्वर्गमा छ र पृथ्वीमा के कुरा हो पर्छ।

trans-unit.source: Do you not see that Allah has subjected to you whatever is on the earth and the ships which run through the sea by His command? And He restrains the sky from falling upon the earth, unless by His permission. Indeed Allah, to the people, is Kind and Merciful.
trans-unit.target: तपाईं अल्लाह जे पृथ्वी र उहाँको आज्ञा द्वारा समुद्र मार्फत चलान जहाजहरू छ तपाईंलाई अधीनमा छ भनेर बुझ्न छैन?

trans-unit.source: And He is the one who gave you life; then He causes you to die and then will [again] give you life. Indeed, mankind is ungrateful.
trans-unit.target: र उहाँले तपाईंलाई जीवन दिनुभयो जो एक छ;

trans-unit.source: For every religion We have appointed rites which they perform. So, [O Muhammad], let the disbelievers not contend with you over the matter but invite them to your Lord. Indeed, you are upon straight guidance.
trans-unit.target: हरेक धर्म लागि हामी तिनीहरूले प्रदर्शन जो रीतिथितिहरू नियुक्त गरेका छन्।

trans-unit.source: And if they dispute with you, then say, "Allah is most knowing of what you do.
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले तपाईं संग विवाद भने, त्यसपछि, "अल्लाह तपाईं के को भन्दा जानने भन्छन्।

trans-unit.source: Allah will judge between you on the Day of Resurrection concerning that over which you used to differ."
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह जो माथि तपाईं भिन्न गर्न प्रयोग सम्बन्धमा पुनरुत्थानको दिन मा तपाईं बीचमा न्याय गर्नेछु। "

trans-unit.source: Do you not know that Allah knows what is in the heaven and earth? Indeed, that is in a Record. Indeed that, for Allah, is easy.
trans-unit.target: तपाईं अल्लाह स्वर्ग र पृथ्वी मा छ के थाह छ कि छैन?

trans-unit.source: And they worship besides Allah that for which He has not sent down authority and that of which they have no knowledge. And there will not be for the wrongdoers any helper.
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले जसको लागि उहाँले अख्तियार तल पठाइएको र जो तिनीहरूले कुनै ज्ञान छ छ अल्लाह बाहेक उपासना।

trans-unit.source: And when Our verses are recited to them as clear evidences, you recognize in the faces of those who disbelieve disapproval. They are almost on the verge of assaulting those who recite to them Our verses. Say, "Then shall I inform you of [what is] worse than that? [It is] the Fire which Allah has promised those who disbelieve, and wretched is the destination."
trans-unit.target: र हाम्रो पदहरू स्पष्ट साक्ष्य रूपमा तिनीहरूलाई recited गर्दा, तपाईं अनुमोदन disbelieve गर्नेहरूलाई को अनुहार मा पहिचान।

trans-unit.source: O people, an example is presented, so listen to it. Indeed, those you invoke besides Allah will never create [as much as] a fly, even if they gathered together for that purpose. And if the fly should steal away from them a [tiny] thing, they could not recover it from him. Weak are the pursuer and pursued.
trans-unit.target: हे मान्छे, एउटा उदाहरण प्रस्तुत गरेको छ, त्यसैले यसलाई सुन्न।

trans-unit.source: They have not appraised Allah with true appraisal. Indeed, Allah is Powerful and Exalted in Might.
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूले साँचो मूल्यांकन संग अल्लाह appraised छैन।

trans-unit.source: Allah chooses from the angels messengers and from the people. Indeed, Allah is Hearing and Seeing.
trans-unit.target: अल्लाह स्वर्गदूतहरू दूतहरूलाई देखि र मान्छे देखि रोज्ने।

trans-unit.source: He knows what is [presently] before them and what will be after them. And to Allah will be returned [all] matters.
trans-unit.target: उहाँले [वर्तमान] तिनीहरूलाई अघि के थाह छ र तिनीहरूलाई पछि के हुनेछ।

trans-unit.source: O you who have believed, bow and prostrate and worship your Lord and do good - that you may succeed.
trans-unit.target: हे तपाईं विश्वास गरेका, धनुष र लमतन्न परेर पसारिएका र आफ्नो प्रभु उपासना र राम्रो के - तपाईं सफल हुन सक्छ भनेर।

trans-unit.source: And strive for Allah with the striving due to Him. He has chosen you and has not placed upon you in the religion any difficulty. [It is] the religion of your father, Abraham. Allah named you "Muslims" before [in former scriptures] and in this [revelation] that the Messenger may be a witness over you and you may be witnesses over the people. So establish prayer and give zakah and hold fast to Allah. He is your protector; and excellent is the protector, and excellent is the helper.
trans-unit.target: र उहाँलाई कारण प्रयत्न संग अल्लाह लागि प्रयास गर्छन्।

trans-unit.source: Certainly will the believers have succeeded:
trans-unit.target: पक्कै पनि विश्वासीहरूले सफल हुनेछ:

trans-unit.source: They who are during their prayer humbly submissive
trans-unit.target: आफ्नो नम्र भई अधीनमा प्रार्थनाको बेला भएका तिनीहरूले

trans-unit.source: And they who turn away from ill speech
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले गर्ने दूर बिरामी बोली देखि बारी

trans-unit.source: And they who are observant of zakah
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले गर्ने zakah को सावधान छन्

trans-unit.source: And they who guard their private parts
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले जसले निजी भागहरु रक्षा

trans-unit.source: Except from their wives or those their right hands possess, for indeed, they will not be blamed -
trans-unit.target: तिनीहरूका पत्नीहरू वा ती आफ्नो दायाँ हात बाट बाहेक अधिकार, साँच्चै लागि, तिनीहरूले दोष हुनेछ -

trans-unit.source: But whoever seeks beyond that, then those are the transgressors -
trans-unit.target: तर त्यो बाहिर खोज्ने जसले, त्यसपछि ती को transgressors छन् -

trans-unit.source: And they who are to their trusts and their promises attentive
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले भरोसा र आफ्नो प्रतिज्ञा ध्यान गर्न जो छन्

trans-unit.source: And they who carefully maintain their prayers -
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूले गर्ने ध्यान तिनीहरूको प्रार्थना कायम -

trans-unit.source: Those are the inheritors
trans-unit.target: ती को inheritors छन्

trans-unit.source: Who will inherit al-Firdaus. They will abide therein eternally.
trans-unit.target: कसले अधिकार पाउनेछन् अल-Firdaus।

trans-unit.source: And certainly did We create man from an extract of clay.
trans-unit.target: र पक्कै पनि हामी माटो को एक निकाल्ने देखि मानिस सिर्जना गरे।

trans-unit.source: Then We placed him as a sperm-drop in a firm lodging.
trans-unit.target: त्यसपछि हामी दृढ आवासगृह मा एक शुक्राणु ड्रप तिनलाई राख्नुभयो।

trans-unit.source: Then We made the sperm-drop into a clinging clot, and We made the clot into a lump [of flesh], and We made [from] the lump, bones, and We covered the bones with flesh; then We developed him into another creation. So blessed is Allah, the best of creators.
trans-unit.target: त्यसपछि हामी एक clinging थक्का मा शुक्राणु ड्रप गरे, र हामी [शरीरका] एक गांठ मा थक्का गरे, र हामी गरे [बाट] को गांठ, हड्डी र हामी मासु संग हड्डी ढाकिएको;

trans-unit.source: Then indeed, after that you are to die.
trans-unit.target: त्यसपछि साँच्चै, कि पछि तपाईं मर्न छन्।

trans-unit.source: Then indeed you, on the Day of Resurrection, will be resurrected.
trans-unit.target: त्यसपछि साँच्चै तपाईं, पुनरुत्थानको को दिन मा, पुनरुत्थान हुनेछ।

trans-unit.source: And We have created above you seven layered heavens, and never have We been of [Our] creation unaware.
trans-unit.target: र हामी तपाईंलाई सात स्तरित आकाश माथि बनाएको छ, र हामीले कहिल्यै [हाम्रो] अनजान सृष्टिको गरिएको छ।

trans-unit.source: And We have sent down rain from the sky in a measured amount and settled it in the earth. And indeed, We are Able to take it away.
trans-unit.target: र हामी तल एक मापन रकममा आकाशबाट वर्षा पठाइएको र पृथ्वी मा बसोबास छ।

trans-unit.source: And We brought forth for you thereby gardens of palm trees and grapevines in which for you are abundant fruits and from which you eat.
trans-unit.target: र हामी खजुरका र तपाईं प्रशस्त फल छन् जो र जसबाट तपाईं खान grapevines को जसबाट उद्यान लागि निस्कने ल्याए।

trans-unit.source: And [We brought forth] a tree issuing from Mount Sinai which produces oil and food for those who eat.
trans-unit.target: र जो खान ती लागि तेल र खाद्य उत्पादन जो सीनै पर्वतमा एक रूख issuing [हामी निस्कने ल्याए]।

trans-unit.source: And indeed, for you in livestock is a lesson. We give you drink from that which is in their bellies, and for you in them are numerous benefits, and from them you eat.
trans-unit.target: अनि साँच्चै, तपाईं पशुधन लागि एउटा पाठ हो।

trans-unit.source: And upon them and on ships you are carried.
trans-unit.target: र तिनीहरूमाथि र जहाज तपाईं लगे छन्।

trans-unit.source: And We had certainly sent Noah to his people, and he said, "O my people, worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: र हामी उसको मानिसहरूलाई नूह पठाएका थिए, र उहाँले भन्नुभयो, "हे मेरा मानिसहरू, उपासना अल्लाह; तपाईंले उहाँलाई भन्दा अन्य कुनै उहााको ईश्वरत्व छ;? त्यसपछि तपाईंले उहाँलाई डर छैन"

trans-unit.source: But the eminent among those who disbelieved from his people said, "This is not but a man like yourselves who wishes to take precedence over you; and if Allah had willed [to send a messenger], He would have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our forefathers.
trans-unit.target: तर आफ्नो मान्छे देखि disbelieved गर्नेहरूलाई बीच महत ", भन्नुभयो यो छैन तर तपाईं पूर्वता लिन इच्छा गर्ने आफूलाई जस्तै मानिस; र अल्लाह इरादों थियो भने हामी छन् [एक दूत पठाउन], उहाँले तल स्वर्गदूतहरू पठाएको थियो।

trans-unit.source: He is not but a man possessed with madness, so wait concerning him for a time."
trans-unit.target: उहाँले छैन तर मानिसको पागलपन संग नजिकै, त्यसैले एक पटक उहाँलाई विषयमा प्रतीक्षा गर्नुहोस्। "

trans-unit.source: [Noah] said, "My Lord, support me because they have denied me."
trans-unit.target: [नूह] "तिनीहरूले मलाई अस्वीकार किनभने मेरो प्रभु, मलाई समर्थन।", भन्नुभयो

trans-unit.source: So We inspired to him, "Construct the ship under Our observation, and Our inspiration, and when Our command comes and the oven overflows, put into the ship from each [creature] two mates and your family, except those for whom the decree [of destruction] has proceeded. And do not address Me concerning those who have wronged; indeed, they are to be drowned.
trans-unit.target: त्यसैले हामी, उहाँलाई प्रेरणा "हाम्रो अवलोकन अन्तर्गत जहाज रचनागर्नुहोस्, र हाम्रो प्रेरणा र हाम्रो आदेश आउँदा र ओवन ओतप्रोत, प्रत्येक [प्राणी] बाट जहाज हालिदिए दुई जीवनसाथी र आफ्नो परिवार, जसलाई उर्दी [लागि ती बाहेक

trans-unit.source: And when you have boarded the ship, you and those with you, then say, 'Praise to Allah who has saved us from the wrongdoing people.'
trans-unit.target: र तपाईं जहाजमा आएछन् जब, तपाईं र तपाईंसँग ती, त्यसपछि, 'यो गल्तीको मान्छे हामीलाई सुरक्षित छ जो अल्लाह प्रशंसा।' भन्न

trans-unit.source: And say, 'My Lord, let me land at a blessed landing place, and You are the best to accommodate [us].' "
trans-unit.target: र 'मेरो प्रभु, मलाई अनमोल अवतरण ठाउँमा भूमि गरौं, र तपाईं [हामीलाई] समायोजित गर्न सबै भन्दा राम्रो हो।', भन्न

trans-unit.source: Indeed in that are signs, and indeed, We are ever testing [Our servants].
trans-unit.target: वास्तवमा भन्ने मा संकेत साँच्चै, हामी कहिल्यै परीक्षण छन् [हाम्रो सेवकहरू] हो, र।

trans-unit.source: Then We produced after them a generation of others.
trans-unit.target: त्यसपछि हामी अरूको एक पुस्ता तिनीहरूलाई पछि उत्पादन।

trans-unit.source: And We sent among them a messenger from themselves, [saying], "Worship Allah; you have no deity other than Him; then will you not fear Him?"
trans-unit.target: र हामी आफूलाई तिनीहरूलाई बीच एक दूत पठाएको, [भन्दै] "उपासना अल्लाह; तपाईंले उहाँलाई भन्दा अन्य कुनै उहााको ईश्वरत्व छ;? त्यसपछि तपाईंले उहाँलाई डर छैन"

trans-unit.source: And the eminent among his people who disbelieved and denied the meeting of the Hereafter while We had given them luxury in the worldly life said, "This is not but a man like yourselves. He eats of that from which you eat and drinks of what you drink.
trans-unit.target: र disbelieved र हामी सांसारिक जीवनमा तिनीहरूलाई लक्जरी दिनुभएको थियो, जबकि अगाडी हिड को बैठक अस्वीकार गर्ने आफ्नो मान्छे बीच महत ", भन्नुभयो यो छैन तर आफूलाई जस्तै मानिस। उहाँले तपाईं के को, जसबाट तपाईं खान कि खान्छ र पेय

trans-unit.source: And if you should obey a man like yourselves, indeed, you would then be losers.
